title: Comprehensive Developer URLs - Final Merged List
body:
# Comprehensive Developer URLs - Final Merged List

## Overview
Consolidated reference of all essential developer URLs, repositories, and resources for enterprise development, troubleshooting, and productivity enhancement.

## GitHub Repositories - Core Development

### Service Fabric Ecosystem
- **microsoft/service-fabric** - Main Service Fabric repository
  - https://github.com/microsoft/service-fabric
- **microsoft/service-fabric-services-and-actors-dotnet** - .NET SDK for Service Fabric
  - https://github.com/microsoft/service-fabric-services-and-actors-dotnet
- **microsoft/service-fabric-observer** - System and app monitoring for production debugging
  - https://github.com/microsoft/service-fabric-observer
- **microsoft/CollectServiceFabricData** - Critical data collection tool for troubleshooting
  - https://github.com/microsoft/CollectServiceFabricData
- **Azure-Samples/service-fabric-cluster-templates** - Production cluster deployment templates
  - https://github.com/Azure-Samples/service-fabric-cluster-templates
- **Azure/Service-Fabric-Troubleshooting-Guides** - Production troubleshooting guides
  - https://github.com/Azure/Service-Fabric-Troubleshooting-Guides
- **microsoft/service-fabric-backup-explorer** - Backup analysis and recovery tool
  - https://github.com/microsoft/service-fabric-backup-explorer

### .NET Core & ASP.NET
- **dotnet/runtime** - .NET runtime, essential for understanding internals
  - https://github.com/dotnet/runtime
- **dotnet/aspnetcore** - ASP.NET Core for web service development
  - https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore
- **dotnet/orleans** - Orleans for distributed application patterns
  - https://github.com/dotnet/orleans
- **dotnet/roslyn-analyzers** - Code quality and pattern analysis tools
  - https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn-analyzers
- **dotnet/machinelearning** - ML.NET for big data pattern analysis
  - https://github.com/dotnet/machinelearning
- **dotnet/reactive** - Reactive Extensions for complex data stream processing
  - https://github.com/dotnet/reactive

### Azure Core Services
- **Azure/azure-cli** - Essential Azure management tool
  - https://github.com/Azure/azure-cli
- **Azure/azure-sdk-for-net** - Azure SDK for .NET enterprise applications
  - https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-net
- **Azure/bicep** - Infrastructure as Code for enterprise deployments
  - https://github.com/Azure/bicep
- **MicrosoftDocs/azure-docs-rest-apis** - Azure REST API documentation source
  - https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/azure-docs-rest-apis
- **Azure/azure-rest-api-specs** - OpenAPI specifications for Azure services
  - https://github.com/Azure/azure-rest-api-specs
- **Azure/ResourceModules** - Enterprise-grade Azure Resource modules
  - https://github.com/Azure/ResourceModules

### Azure Functions & Serverless
- **Azure/azure-functions-host** - Azure Functions runtime for serverless patterns
  - https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-host
- **Azure/azure-functions-dotnet-worker** - .NET worker for high-performance functions
  - https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-dotnet-worker

### Monitoring & Observability
- **microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet** - Application performance monitoring
  - https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet
- **Azure/azure-monitor-for-containers** - Container monitoring for production systems
  - https://github.com/Azure/azure-monitor-for-containers

### PowerShell & Automation
- **PowerShell/PowerShell** - PowerShell Core for automation
  - https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell
- **Azure/azure-powershell** - Azure automation and management
  - https://github.com/Azure/azure-powershell

### Data & Storage
- **Azure/azure-cosmos-dotnet-v3** - Cosmos DB for large-scale data applications
  - https://github.com/Azure/azure-cosmos-dotnet-v3
- **Azure/azure-storage-net** - Azure Storage for big data scenarios
  - https://github.com/Azure/azure-storage-net

### AI & Machine Learning
- **microsoft/semantic-kernel** - AI orchestration for enterprise applications
  - https://github.com/microsoft/semantic-kernel
- **microsoft/guidance** - Structured AI generation for consistent outputs
  - https://github.com/microsoft/guidance
- **microsoft/autogen** - Multi-agent systems for complex enterprise workflows
  - https://github.com/microsoft/autogen
- **microsoft/kernel-memory** - Memory management for AI applications
  - https://github.com/microsoft/kernel-memory

### Model Context Protocol (MCP)
- **modelcontextprotocol/typescript-sdk** - TypeScript SDK for tool development
  - https://github.com/modelcontextprotocol/typescript-sdk
- **modelcontextprotocol/servers** - Official server implementations and patterns
  - https://github.com/modelcontextprotocol/servers

### Microsoft Learn & Documentation
- **Azure Well-Architected Framework** - Enterprise architecture principles
  - https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/well-architected/
- **Service Fabric Diagnostics** - Production troubleshooting guide
  - https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/service-fabric/service-fabric-diagnostics-overview
- **.NET Debugging and Diagnostics** - Essential debugging tools and techniques
  - https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/core/diagnostics/
- **Azure Troubleshooting Documentation** - Platform-level troubleshooting
  - https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/troubleshoot/azure/
- **Microservices Architecture** - Enterprise microservices design patterns
  - https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/microservices/
- **Cloud Adoption Framework** - Enterprise cloud strategy and implementation
  - https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cloud-adoption-framework/
- **Enterprise-Scale Landing Zones** - Large-scale Azure architecture patterns
  - https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cloud-adoption-framework/ready/enterprise-scale/

## MCP Ecosystem Resources

### Core MCP Documentation
- **Model Context Protocol** - Specification and documentation
  - https://modelcontextprotocol.io/
- **MCP Tools Reference** - Complete tool catalog documentation
  - Internal reference for 43+ MCP server builtin tools
- **VS Code MCP Integration** - VS Code builtin tools reference
  - Documentation for 19+ VS Code builtin tools for MCP

### Azure MCP Integrations
- **Azure MCP Server** - Comprehensive Azure service integration
  - Tools for Azure CLI, Azure Developer CLI, Azure Quick Review CLI
  - Support for 30+ Azure services including Container Registry, Kubernetes, App Configuration
- **Azure DevOps MCP Server** - DevOps workflow integration
  - Project management, CI/CD pipelines, work items, testing tools
  - Package management, security, compliance, and analytics

## Priority Classification

### Priority 1 (Daily Development)
1. Service Fabric troubleshooting and core repositories
2. .NET diagnostics and performance tools
3. Azure CLI and PowerShell automation
4. MCP Index Server and instruction management
5. Azure monitoring and Application Insights

### Priority 2 (Architecture & Integration)
1. Azure SDK and service integrations
2. Model Context Protocol ecosystem
3. AI/ML frameworks and tools
4. Infrastructure as Code (Bicep, ARM templates)
5. Enterprise architecture patterns

### Priority 3 (Reference & Learning)
1. Microsoft Learn documentation
2. API specifications and REST documentation
3. Community tools and extensions
4. Advanced monitoring and observability
5. Compliance and governance frameworks

## Usage Guidelines

### For Development Teams
- Start with Priority 1 resources for immediate productivity
- Use Service Fabric Observer for production monitoring
- Leverage CollectServiceFabricData for troubleshooting
- Implement proper logging with Application Insights

### For Architecture Teams
- Focus on Well-Architected Framework principles
- Use Enterprise-Scale Landing Zones for large deployments
- Implement proper governance with Azure policies
- Leverage MCP tools for automation and integration

### For DevOps Teams
- Utilize Azure CLI and PowerShell for automation
- Implement CI/CD with Azure DevOps MCP integration
- Monitor deployments with Azure Monitor
- Use Infrastructure as Code best practices

## Maintenance Notes

- **Last Updated**: August 29, 2025
- **Review Frequency**: Monthly
- **Validation**: All URLs verified and accessible
- **Integration Status**: Fully integrated with MCP ecosystem
- **Backup Location**: C:/cases/mcp-instructions-backup-recovery/

This comprehensive list serves as the definitive reference for all development, troubleshooting, and enterprise integration needs across the Microsoft/Azure ecosystem.
semanticSummary: # Comprehensive Developer URLs - Final Merged List
